channel.title: Proxy On Computer
channel.description:
i have a problem with server status....my brother have added proxy on my internet modem..i can run the server..when i add server on status. and i click the link it say this.
Error: team-island.zapto.org resolves to ########, which does not match your ip, ########.
but i hosting my server using my computer.
i have mopar staff will help.

item.title: Proxy On Computer
item.dc:creator: @Island_Forum Island Forum
item.description:
@Island_Forum wrote:

nooo…u miss understanding…first my bro did proxy using Starhub modem…few days later…parent bought new singtel moderm…i just found out that singtel aready add proxy on the modem…that why i add server on status it say error…last time there no error…

i can host server…im hosting on my computer…example i add status on rune-server and it work…

Read full topic

item.title: Proxy On Computer
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Island Forum:

but the problem is…im using Singtel Modem that on my Singapore Country…they set proxy…idk how to remove it…so mopar would you help me how to remove my proxy?

You said your brother added it.

But regardless, if you are really behind a proxy then you can’t host a server anyway, no outside your network would be able to connect to you.

So either you are behind a proxy and you can’t host a server and so don’t need to verify anything, or you aren’t so you can host a server and verify it.

Read full topic
